metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15691 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: TigerVNC version prior to 1.10.1 is vulnerable to stack use-after-return,which occurs due to incorrect usage of stack memory in ZRLEDecoder. Ifdecoding routine would throw an exception, ZRLEDecoder may try to accessstack variable, which has been already freed during the process of stackunwinding. Exploitation of this vulnerability could potentially result intoremote code execution. This attack appear to be exploitable via networkconnectivity.

criterions.comment: tigervnc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
